org.vulcanium.scoreboard.Criteria

Packages that use Criteria
Package
Description
org.vulcanium
The root package of the Bukkit API, contains generalized API classes.
org.vulcanium.scoreboard
Interfaces used to manage the client side score display system.

    static final Criteria
    Criteria.AIR
    Mirrors the player's air supply (0 for no air, 300 for maximum air).

    Mirrors the player's armor points (0 for no armor, 20 for maximum armor).
